title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1205.5 - Nonlegal professions eligible to form cooperative business arrangements with lawyers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1205.5 - Nonlegal professions eligible to form cooperative business arrangements with lawyers

State Regulations

Members of the following nonlegal professions are
eligible to form contractual business relationships with lawyers: Architecture Certified Public Accountancy Professional

Engineering Land Surveying Certified Social Work

Notes

1205.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
